entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Arnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
